abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column holds that Texas Rangers manager Ron Washington readily defers to St Louis Cardinals manager Tony La Russa's experience and acumen but did not need to match wits with Russa to break the 2-2 tie in World Series Game 5.
snippet: Ron Washington, the manager of the Texas Rangers, readily defers to Tony La Russa’s acumen, but he didn’t need to match wits with the Cardinals’ manager for Monday night’s victory.
lead_paragraph: Ron Washington, the manager of the Texas Rangers, readily defers to Tony La Russa’s acumen, but he didn’t need to match wits with the Cardinals’ manager for Monday night’s victory.

headline.main: Going Against La Russa, and Against Convention
headline.print_headline: Going Against La Russa, And Against Convention
headline.seo: For Rangers’ Washington, the Unconventional Works
